name: Fergus Loves Eggs
description:
Fergus Loves Eggs is a platformer/SHMUP with a twist, you have to traverse the level whilst ensuring you don't drop the egg in the basket on your back.

Demo version includes a full playable level.

Follow progress on Twitter - @SidFishGames

Theme Music:

Cheerful 1 - Choro Bavario (happy loop) by qubodup (CC BY-SA 3.0)

https://opengameart.org/content/cheerful-1-choro-bavario-happy-loop
